name: HKClinicalTypeIdentifier
desc: Type identifiers for the different categories of clinical records.

items.name: static let allergyRecord: HKClinicalTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A type identifier for records of allergic or intolerant reactions.

items.name: static let conditionRecord: HKClinicalTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A type identifier for records of a condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event.

items.name: static let immunizationRecord: HKClinicalTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A type identifier for records of the current or historical administration of vaccines.

items.name: static let labResultRecord: HKClinicalTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A type identifier for records of lab results.

items.name: static let medicationRecord: HKClinicalTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A type identifier for records of medication.

items.name: static let procedureRecord: HKClinicalTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A type identifier for records of procedures.

items.name: static let vitalSignRecord: HKClinicalTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A type identifier for records of vital signs.

items.name: static let coverageRecord: HKClinicalTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A type identifier for records containing information about the userâ€™s insurance coverage.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Returns a new clinical record type identifier for the provided string.
